mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysBrndPrdlstHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BRND_ID , PRDLST_CD , HIST_DT , PRDLST_NM , PRDLST_GRP_CD , USE_YN , REPAIR_PSB_YN , SHOP_REPAIR_FEE_SECT_CD , SHOP_REPAIR_FEE_AMT , SHOP_REPAIR_FEE_RT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_BRND_PRDLST_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND BRND_ID = #{brndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRDLST_CD = #{prdlstCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HIST_DT = #{histDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
